languages.text: {n}Окровавленные пальцы ложатся на холку кибермастифа.{/n} "Мы всегда знали, что все кончится как-то так, да, Глейто?" {n}Соломон отворачивается, словно вы перестали существовать.{/n}
{n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Окровавленные пальцы ложатся на холку кибермастифа.{/n} "Мы всегда знали, что все кончится как-то так, да, Глейто?" {n}Соломон отворачивается, словно вы перестали существовать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mann legt seine blutige Hand auf die Schulter des Cyber-Mastiffs.{/n} "Wir wussten immer, dass es so enden würde, stimmt's, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne wendet sich ab, als hättest du dich in Luft aufgelöst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Mann legt seine blutige Hand auf die Schulter des Cyber-Mastiffs.{/n} "Wir wussten immer, dass es so enden würde, stimmt's, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne wendet sich ab, als hättest du dich in Luft aufgelöst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme repose sa main ensanglantée sur l'échine du cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Nous avons toujours su que ça se terminerait ainsi, n'est-ce pas, Glaito ? » {n}Solomorne se détourne comme si vous aviez cessé d'exister.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme repose sa main ensanglantée sur l'échine du cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Nous avons toujours su que ça se terminerait ainsi, n'est-ce pas, Glaito ? » {n}Solomorne se détourne comme si vous aviez cessé d'exister.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre posa su ensangrentada mano sobre la cerviz del cibermastín.{/n} «Siempre supimos que acabaríamos así, ¿verdad que sí, Glaito?». {n}Solomorne se da media vuelta como si hubieses dejado de existir para él.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre posa su ensangrentada mano sobre la cerviz del cibermastín.{/n} «Siempre supimos que acabaríamos así, ¿verdad que sí, Glaito?». {n}Solomorne se da media vuelta como si hubieses dejado de existir para él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙将血迹斑斑的手搭在了生化獒犬的背上。{/n}“我们早就知道事情会变成这个样子，你说是吧，格雷托？”{n}说完这句话，索罗蒙便转过了身，仿佛你已经不存在了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙将血迹斑斑的手搭在了生化獒犬的背上。{/n}“我们早就知道事情会变成这个样子，你说是吧，格雷托？”{n}说完这句话，索罗蒙便转过了身，仿佛你已经不存在了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}男は血に染まった手を、サイバーマスチフの肩にそっと置いた。{/n}「こうなることは分かっていたさ。なあ、グライト？」{n}ソロモーンは、あなたの存在など最初からなかったかのように、そっと背を向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男は血に染まった手を、サイバーマスチフの肩にそっと置いた。{/n}「こうなることは分かっていたさ。なあ、グライト？」{n}ソロモーンは、あなたの存在など最初からなかったかのように、そっと背を向けた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini siber mastifin omuzlarına atıyor.{/n} "Sonumuzun böyle olacağını zaten biliyorduk, değil mi Glaito?" {n}Solomorne seni görmezden gelerek başını başka tarafa çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man rests his bloodied hand on the cyber-mastiff's shoulders.{/n} "We always knew it would end like this, didn't we, Glaito?" {n}Solomorne turns away as if you had ceased to exist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elini siber mastifin omuzlarına atıyor.{/n} "Sonumuzun böyle olacağını zaten biliyorduk, değil mi Glaito?" {n}Solomorne seni görmezden gelerek başını başka tarafa çeviriyor.{/n}
